titleStmt.title: An answer to Mercurius Aulicus: or, His communicated intelligence from the court to the rest of the Kingdome: faithfully trased through, to undisceive those who love the truth. The forty ninth weeke, ending December. 9.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place of publication from Wing.
Mercurius Aulicus is a periodical publication from Oxford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
